page.shortlink: Form View Builder Properties/Conflict Resolution/Method for resolving conflicts Property
page.description: How should write conflicts be resolved. If 'Custom' then specify code for the 'resolveConflict' event.

section.description: Available options for the Method for resolving conflicts property are listed below:

item.name: Custom
item.description: Resolve conflict using custom code. The custom code to resolve the conflict must be defined in the ['resolveConflict' event].

item.name: Editor
item.description: Resolve conflict using an Editor. The Editor used is defined in the [Editor] and [Editor set] properties.
